message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.CR 

This paper discusses the concept of dual connectivity in 5G networks, which is a topic related to network infrastructure and communication protocols. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also involves the use of stochastic geometry and performance evaluation, which are related to information theory and signal processing, respectively. Therefore, cs.IT (Information Theory), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.MM (Multimedia) are also likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper discusses the potential security concerns related to dual connectivity, which falls under the scope of cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
